feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.6.0
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

V1 API now attempts to resolve the proper type for each parameter. Some strings may now be numbers. This will help in porting data to InfluxDB

What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/53
  • Bump pnpm/action-setup from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/51
  • add copy command to package.json - fixes #35 by @vhsdream in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/55
  • Bump crowdin/github-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/54
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/59
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/58
  • Add support for Grafana & InfluxDB by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/61

New Contributors

  • @vhsdream made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/55

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.5.2...v2.6.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v2.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.0.2 to 4.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/62
  • Fix for UPS devices without serial numbers by @Brandawg93 in 03d123641cdabbe035d604980d547ccf7a4b9693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.6.0...v2.6.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.0.0
entry.content:
Breaking Changes

Environment variables no longer change settings directly, but instead can be used to populate settings on the first run. All settings are now handled via UI but can be modified directly by editing settings.yml.

What's Changed

  • Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/68
  • InfluxDBv2 support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/71
  • Fixed bug that caused refresh to stop working
  • Added support for direct connection to InfluxDBv2 instances via environment variables
  • Added better grafana dashboard examples
  • Reworked settings into settings.yml instead of environment variables
  • Added new UI for connecting and disconnecting from nut-upsd instance
  • Fixed bug that prevented theme from switching when system theme was changed
  • Fixed bug that prevented device serial number from displaying properly

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v2.6.1...v3.0.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/77
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/79
  • armv7 Support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/80
  • Updated NextJS to 15
  • Updated nodeJS to 22

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.1

  • Fixed issue where container would not start if a docker volume was not specified
